channel.title: Posts on Adam Farkas Blog

item.title: On starting this blog
item.description: Why does somebody start a personal blog? While there are many reasons the more people you ask you will see overlapping patterns. But since this is my first post I think I have to elaborate anyway. At least for the future me to remind him of the specific reasons – and ideally motivating him to keep posting… ;) Produce The last couple of years I was in a state of mainly consuming.
